resolveParameterName.name: resolveParameterName

resolveParameterType.code:
function resolveParameterType(type, logicalName, action) {
    if(logicalName === 'entityimage') return 'buffer'
    if(action === 'interface' && (type === 'Picklist' || type === 'Lookup' || type === 'Owner')) return 'text'
    switch(type) {
        case 'String':
            return 'text'
        case 'Boolean':
            return 'boolean'
        case 'BigInt':
        case 'Integer':
            return 'integer'
        case 'Decimal':
        case 'Money':
            return 'number'
        case 'DateTime':
            return 'text'
        case 'Picklist':
        case 'Lookup':
        case 'Owner':
            return 'select'
        case 'Uniqueidentifier':
            return 'uuid'
        default:
            return 'text'
    }
}
resolveParameterType.name: resolveParameterType
